com.veraxsystems.vxipmi.coding.payload

Class PlainMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.veraxsystems.vxipmi.coding.payload.IpmiPayload
      • com.veraxsystems.vxipmi.coding.payload.PlainMessage

  • public class PlainMessage
extends IpmiPayload
    Represents IPMI payload fully specified by user - contains wrapped byte array which is returned as a payload via getPayloadData(). Used for OpenSession and RAKP messages.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlainMessage(byte[] data)
      Creates IPMI payload.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] getIpmiCommandData()
      Returns IPMI command encapsulated in IPMI Payload.
      byte[] getPayloadData()
      Returns unencrypted payload encoded in byte array (owner is responsible for encryption).
      int getPayloadLength()
      Returns encoded but UNENCRYPTED payload length.

      • Methods inherited from class com.veraxsystems.vxipmi.coding.payload.IpmiPayload

        encryptPayload, getData, getEncryptedPayload, setData

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
